mapper.select: select m.block,m.email,m.name,co.sell_cnt,m.date1,m.code from (select c.no,o.no order_no,c.member_email,count(c.member_email) as sell_cnt from p1_cart c INNER JOIN p1_order o on c.no = o.cart_no GROUP BY c.member_email) co INNER JOIN p1_member m on co.member_email = m.email where m.code=1;
mapper.update: update p1_member set block = #{block} where email=#{email}
